topic.title: Install the HP Helion Code Engine

body.section:
PrerequisitesInstalling services requires that the HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, has already been installed.
The images for the individual services will be downloaded when the service installation is started. A separate download step is not necessary.
The installer retrieves service configuration information from the clouds.yaml file. If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you can create one now.
The HP Helion Code Engine also requires a code repository hosted on GitHub or a private server.

section.title: Install the HP Helion Code Engine
section.note: For help with the installer, enter the command openstack hdpi

ol.li: The installer retrieves service configuration information from the clouds.yaml file. If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you must create one now.
Run the installer. openstack hdpi helionci install --package wscatalog.3333
Launch the HP Helion Code Engine.os hdpi helionci launch
